sys_ux_client_script.name: Open Record From List

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_e0803d324702b110036bbce5536d4396
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes>58d17acf0b531010a8b1c96237673a68</includes><macroponent display_value="Default">d3af25b24702b110036bbce5536d43de</macroponent><name>Open Record From List</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({
    api,
    helpers,
    event,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        routeMapping,
        buildDefaultRoutePayload
    } = imports["global.recordRoutesMapping"]();


    var route = 'record';
    var targetRoute = '';
    const defaultRoutePayload = buildDefaultRoutePayload(route, targetRoute, event);

    const routeMap = api.data.dynamic_routing_list.routeMap;
    const payload = routeMapping(routeMap, defaultRoutePayload, event);


    //Telco code start
    if (event.payload.table && event.payload.table == "sn_ind_tmt_orm_order" && event.payload.row && event.payload.row.rowData) {
        const dataMap = event.payload.row.rowData.value;
        const stateVal = dataMap.get("state");

        if (stateVal.columnData.value === "draft") {
            api.setState("customerOrderId", event.payload.sys_id);
            api.setState('recordPagePayload', payload);
            api.data.get_customer_order_detail.refresh();
            return;
        }
    }
    //Telco code end

    // If a table name passed into trueupTable matches the existing table
    // refresh trueup DR to get real table name; otherwise use existing.
    if (api.state.routeParentTables && api.state.routeParentTables.split(',').find(table => table === payload.fields.table)) {
        api.setState('navigationPayload', payload);
        api.data.resolve_route_parent_tables.refresh();
    } else {
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', payload);
    }

}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-26 16:06:40</sys_created_on><sys_id>e0803d324702b110036bbce5536d4396</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Open Record From List</sys_name><sys_package display_value="AT&amp;T Workspace" source="x_876519_att_work">e90c1d2e47c63110036bbce5536d43e6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AT&amp;T Workspace">e90c1d2e47c63110036bbce5536d43e6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_e0803d324702b110036bbce5536d4396</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-26 16:06:40</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
